snippet: David Blatt stepped down as coach of Maccabi Tel Aviv, the European club champion, saying he wanted to pursue his dream of coaching in the N.B.A.
abstract: David Blatt steps down as coach of Maccabi Tel Aviv, European club champion, saying he wants to pursue his dream of coaching in the NBA.
lead_paragraph: David Blatt stepped down as coach of Maccabi Tel Aviv, the European club champion, saying he wanted to pursue his dream of coaching in the N.B.A.

headline.main: Coach Leaving Israel to Seek N.B.A. Job
